plot: Sokka and Katara meet a friend of their father who offers to take them to join the Water Tribe's navy. Aang fears his friends will choose seeing their father again over staying with him.

Sokka and Katara meet Bato, a friend of their father, Hakoda. Aang begins to feel left out and he hides a map from Katara and Sokka, fearing that his friends might leave him. Sokka and Katara find out that Aang hid the map from them. Sokka and Katara decide to go with Bato so they can meet their father. Aang decides to go to the Northern Water Tribe on his own so he can master water. Sokka and Katara begin to regret leaving Aang, they decide to accompany Aang to the Northern Water Tribe. Meanwhile, Zuko has hired June, a female bounty hunter to find Aang. During the ensuing fight with Prince Zuko, Aang is able to get Katara's necklace back. Katara thanks Aang for getting her necklace back from Zuko.
